_header: When he thus had made ending
_description: Gospel, In vigilia Epiphanie, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When he þus had made endyngAnd archilaw was cornd king…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …ffor in him euer was might and graceAnd power playne in ilka place
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin “Defuncto herode ecce angelus.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Vocacio cristi ab egypto In vigilia Epiphanie Euangelium secundum Matheum (rubric, ff. 27vb-28ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.250-252.
